verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
UNTO THEE, O LORD
Do I lift up my soul; unto Thee, O Lord, do I lift up
my soul. O my God, I trust in Thee; let me not be
ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Show me Thy ways, Thy ways, O Lord; Teach me
Thy paths, Thy paths, O Lord; O my God, I trust in
Thee; let me not be ashamed, let not mine
enemies triumph over me.
